data.title: Tanglin Trust School
data.meta_description: HR Onboarding - Tanglin Trust School - Awarded International School of the Year 2023 by ISC Research
data.text:
Founded in 1925, Tanglin Trust School is one of the most reputed schools offering British curriculum in Singapore. The school has over 95-years of experience and has a well-established history of providing good quality education, emphasising a British based learning system imbued with an international perspective. Tanglin has been ranked one of The Straits Times Best Employers in 2022 & 2023 and topped the education category nationwide.

Tanglin has been part of the Singapore community for many years. The word community is important to us, and Team Tanglin represents us collectively. But it is you, the individuals that work with our students, and with colleagues across the globe, that make this such a special place.

Team Tanglin looks forward to knowing you better. Your uniqueness as a teacher and colleague will add richness to our dynamic and diverse community. We can’t wait to welcome you to the ‘little red dot’.

Congratulations on your new role at Tanglin Trust School! On behalf of all the members and the management team, I would like to extend our warmest welcome to you. We are excited to have you here.

We put together this microsite to assist you with your onboarding. We recognise the importance of effective onboarding to support your smooth transition and successful start at Tanglin. There is a lot of information to get you started prior to your arrival and once you are here.

We look forward to welcoming you in August to our vibrant and thriving learning community.
